desc: West of Tree Gnome Village
West of the general store in Musa Point
In front of the Brimhaven dungeon entrance
On the southern coast of Lumbridge Swamp
Northeast of the shed in Lumbridge Swamp
South of Port Sarim near Mudskipper Point
East side of the northern mouth of the river running through Karamja
Located in the archipelago east of Yanille. Saradomin mage will attack.
Near the H.A.M. hideout
South of East Ardougne, near Ardougne Zoo
Northeast of the mine north of Shilo Village
North side of the watering hole at the Bedabin camp in the Kharidian Desert Saradomin wizard will attack.
In the mine north of Shilo Village
East of Gu'Tanoth. Enter the Cave Entrance between a lava pool and ruined building on the map with searchable Rocks by the entrance in Feldip Hills to get to the island. Saradomin mage will attack.
Located in northern Crandor, requires at least near-completion of Dragon Slayer to access. Go through the hidden wall in the Karamja Volcano to get back if you've already completed the quest.
In the northern section of Arandar Requires completion of Underground Pass and at least partial completion of Regicide to access. Saradomin mage will attack.
Near the 'top-middle' mine in Feldip Hills
North of the mill in Lumbridge
West of the Bandit Camp in the Kharidian Desert. Saradomin mage will attack.
On Cairn Island beside Shilo Saradomin mage will attack
Southwest of Tree Gnome Stronghold
In Mort Myre Swamp, requires either completion of Priest in Peril or 64 Agility to access. Next lake south of the 2 most western fishing spots. Dig south of a rotting tree
Near the Lady of the Lake in southern Taverly
In the Kharazi Jungle, requires the ability to at least start Legends Quest. Saradomin wizard will attack
South from the gate in the Mort Myre Swamp, requires either completion of Priest in Peril or 64 agility to access. Saradomin wizard will attack.
Southeast area of the Kharazi Jungle by a totem pole near the beach, requires the ability to at least start Legends Quest. Saradomin wizard will attack.
In the southwestern part of Kharazi Jungle, requires the ability to at least start Legends Quest. A Saradomin wizard will attack
East of the Gnome agility course
On the Ice Mountain
Near the entrance to the Slayer Tower, requires either completion of Priest in Peril or 64 Agility.
Swamp in the northwestern corner of Tree Gnome Stronghold
In the fenced of area of the bar in Burthorpe.
Near the air obelisk, go through the Edgeville dungeon. Zamorak wizard will attack.
Wilderness north of the Abyssal Mage near Edgeville. Zamorak mage will attack.
Southeast of Rellekka, near the Swaying tree.
Eastern level 22 Wilderness near the Hill Giants. Zamorak mage will attack.
Broken wall on the east side of the Bandit Camp in Level 23 Wilderness. Zamorak wizard will attack.
Northeast of Rellekka. Saradomin wizard will attack.
Forgotten Cemetery in level 29 wilderness, Zamorak wizard will attack
Southeast of Red Dragon Isle Zamorak wizard will attack.
Near the wilderness pond, right by the canoe location. Zamorak wizard will attack.
Southwest of the Lava Maze. Zamorak wizard will attack.
Behind the building with the Chaos Altar to the south west of the Lava Maze. Zamorak Mage will attack.
In the fenced area west of the Lava Maze A Zamorak wizard will attack
In Miscellania on the path to the mining site and anvil. Talk to the Sailor at the docks in Rellekka to get there, requires The Fremennik Trials' completion first.
North side of the Lava Maze by the two rune rocks. Zamorak wizard will attack
In the demonic ruins Zamorak wizard will attack.
North side of the Rogues' Castle Zamorak wizard will attack
North east of the Deserted Keep. Zamorak wizard will attack.
North side of the Pirates' Hideout. Zamorak wizard will attack.
Northwest of the wilderness Agility Training Area. Zamorak wizard will attack.
Near the animated axes northeast of the Deserted Keep Zamorak wizard will attack
Speak with Saba in a cave northwest of Burthorpe (You talk to him during Death Plateau).
Speak with Caroline east of Ardougne, on the shore (Witchaven/Slug Menace is not implemented yet). Answer to her challenge with 11.
Speak with the Oracle on the Ice Mountain north of Falador. Answer to her challenge with 48.
Speak with Bolkoy in the Tree Gnome Village (NOT the Gnome Stronghold). Answer to his challenge with 13.
Speak with Chieftain Brundt in Rellekka. Answer to his challenge with 4.
Speak with Lowe in the Varrock Archery Store.
Speak with the Recruiter in West Ardougne (Requires partial completion of Plague City). Answer to his challenge with 20.
Speak with Gabooty in the Tai Bwo Wannai Village in Karamja. Answer to his challenge with 11. Requires Jungle Potion completed in order to even see him.
Speak with Luthas at Musa Point in Karamja. Answer to his challenge with 33.
Speak with Femi outside the gates of the Tree Gnome Stronghold.
Speak with Edmond in East Ardougne. Answer to his challenge with 3.
Speak with the Cook in the kitchen of Lumbridge Castle. Answer to his challenge with 9.
Speak with Party Pete in the Seers' Village Party Room (NOT in Falador).
Speak with Cap'n Izzy No-Beard at the Brimhaven Agility Arena entrance. Answer to his challenge with 33.
Speak with King Roald in the Varrock palace. Answer to his challenge with 18.
Speak with Jaraah in the Al Kharid Duel Arena. Answer to his challenge with 28.
Speak with Brimstail in his cave near the southwest corner of the Tree Gnome Stronghold. Answer to his challenge with 6859.
Speak with the Gnome Coach at the Gnomeball Ring in the Tree Gnome Stronghold. Answer to his challenge with 6.
Speak with the Zookeeper in the East Ardougne Zoo. Answer to his challenge with 40.
Speak with King Bolren in the Tree Gnome Village (NOT the Gnome Stronghold).
Speak with Fycie in a cave on the east end of Feldip Hills.
Like it says on the tin. Directly behind the Grand Tree in the Tree Gnome Stronghold.
query: Dig near some giant mushrooms behind the Grand Tree.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The house directly north of the bank.
query: Search the drawers in the upstairs of a house in Catherby.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The drawers of the second floor of Varrock's eastern bank.
query: Search the drawers in the upstairs of the bank to the east of Varrock.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Search the chest in the southern room of the western portion of the Dwarven Mines under Falador.
query: Search the chests in the Dwarven Mines.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Hajedy is in Brimhaven, just south of the docks when you take the ship from Ardougne.
Like it says on the tin. Sir Kay is right outside the doors of the castle.
query: Speak to Sir Kay in Camelot Castle.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The crate seems to appear and disappear only as the clue is active, it's instanced.
query: Search the crates in the Guard House of the northern gate of East Ardougne

desc: Like it says on the tin. The crate seems to be instanced only while the clue is active, like the clue above.
query: Search the crates in the northernmost house in Al Kharid.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The crates are by the Farming patch south of the Varrock castle.
query: Search the crates near a cart in Varrock.

desc: Nearly duplicate to the above clue, search the crates on the other side of the cart.
query: Search the crates near a cart in Varrock.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Port Sarim's pub is right next to Draynor Village.
query: Talk to the bartender of the Rusty Anchor in Port Sarim.

desc: Like it says on the tin. East of Dunstan the Smithy's house.
query: Search the drawers of houses in Burthorpe.

desc: Like it says on the tin. There's only one set of crates inside the store.
query: Search the boxes in Falador's general store.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Go to the house to the east of the eastern bank.
query: Search the boxes in one of the houses in eastern Falador.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The shield shop is right by the Falador Teleport spell's destination.
query: Search the drawers upstairs in Falador's shield shop.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The Squire is in the courtyard of the castle.
query: Talk to the Squire in the White Knights' castle in Falador.

desc: Like it says on the tin. In the southeastern room of the house.
query: Search the drawers in one of Gertrude's bedrooms.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Ned's house is right by the bank.
query: Speak to Ned in Draynor Village.

desc: Actually kinda cryptic for a level 1 clue. Speak to Captain Tobias on the docks in Port Sarim, east from the Fishing store.
query: One of the sailors in Port Sarim is your next destination.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Gaius runs the Two-Handed Sword shop in the northwestern corner of Taverley.
Like it says on the tin. The northernmost house from the bank.
query: Search the drawers in a house in Draynor Village.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Brimstail is in his cave near the southwestern corner of the Tree Gnome Stronghold.
Like it says on the tin. Doric is right by the gated entrance to Taverley.
query: Speak to Doric who lives north of Falador.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Go upstairs in Thessalia's Clothing store.
query: Search the drawers above Varrock's shops.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Go upstairs in Wydin's Grocery Store.
query: Search chests found in the upstairs of shops in Port Sarim.

desc: Like it says on the tin. In Peksa's helmet shop.
query: Search the crates in the Barbarian Village's helmet shop.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Arhein is right by the bank on the docks.
Like it says on the tin. Close the door to access the boxes.
query: Search the boxes in the house near the south entrance of Varrock.

desc: Like it says on the tin. You should know the area, it's basically the best level 1 clue farming spot.
query: Search the boxes in the Goblin house near Lumbridge.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Inside Aemad's shop.
query: Search the crates in East Ardougne's general store.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The northern house connecting to Hetty the Witch's, who you start Witches Potion from.
query: Search through some drawers in the upstairs of a house in Rimmington.

desc: Like it says on the tin. In the room with the spinning wheel, by the church yard with all the Yew trees south of the bank.
query: Search upstairs in the houses of Seers' Village for some drawers.

desc: Like it says on the tin. In the northwesternmost tent.
query: Search the tents in the imperial guard camp in Burthorpe for some boxes.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Climb to the top of the tower.
query: Search the chest in the left-hand tower of Camelot castle.

desc: Like it says on the tin. In the marketplace which is also the Ardougne Teleport location.
query: Search the crates just outside the Armour shop in East Ardougne.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Hemenster is west of Seers' Village / south of McGrubor's Wood / north of Ardougne.
query: Search for a crate in a building in Hemenster.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Go to the very top of the manor where you can start Ernest the Chicken.
query: Search the crates in Draynor Manor.

desc: Another almost-cryptic one for once, on the 3rd floor of Ardougne's church tower. Shares a location and description with level 3 clue ID 3617.
query: A crate found in the tower of a church is your next position.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Ellis runs the tannery just north of the Al Kebab bank.
query: Speak to Ellis in Al Kharid.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The Sinclair Mansion is north of Seers' Village / Camelot, speak to the maid Louisa inside.
query: Speak to the staff of Sinclair Mansion.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The house north of the Silver Stall.
query: Search the drawers on the first floor of a building overlooking Ardougne's market.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Hazelmere is east of Yanille at the end of the archipelago path, watch out for minimap-invisible level 44 Jungle Spiders.
Like it says on the tin. East of the silk and gem stalls.
query: Search the boxes in one of the tents in Al Kharid.

desc: Like it says on the tin. He's the quest giver for Tribal Totem and runs the food store in Brimhaven.
Like it says on the tin. Port Khazard is between Ardougne and Yanille on the coast, look by the general store.
query: Search the crate near a cart in Port Khazard.

desc: Like it says on the tin. In the castle kitchen.
query: Search for a crate in Varrock Palace.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Horvik is in Varrock, just east of the fountain square.
query: Search the crates in Horvik's armoury.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The inn is just south of the fountain square.
query: Speak to the bartender of the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Duke Horacio Nukem is on the second floor of Lumbridge Castle.
query: Search the chest in the Duke of Lumbridge's bedroom.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The house between the Church and Bar.
query: Search for a crate on the ground floor of a building in Seers' Village.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Near the "Infamous carpet of '76".
query: Search the chests upstairs in Al Kharid palace.

desc: Like it says on the tin. East from the east Bank.
query: Search through chests found in the upstairs of houses in eastern Falador.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Wayne's Chains is near the southern gate.
query: Search the drawers in Falador's chainmail shop.

desc: Like it says on the tin. Left-hand from the perspective of outside the entrance, on the second floor of the tower.
query: Search the crate in the left-hand tower of Lumbridge castle.

desc: Like it says on the tin. North of the northern Bank.
query: Search the crates in the shed just north of east Ardougne.

desc: Like it says on the tin. The southern part of the village near the start point for Druidic Ritual.
query: Search through some drawers found in Taverley's houses.

desc: Like it says on the tin. In Gaius' Two Handeds.
query: Search the boxes in a shop in Taverley.

desc: Like it says on the tin. In Gerrant's Fishy Business.
query: Search the crates in the Port Sarim fishing shop.

desc: Search the southeast crates in the house in Yanille that's north of the Magic Guild.
query: Search the crates in a house in Yanille that has a piano.

desc: Speak to Lord Iorwerth at the Elf Camp. Requires completion of Underground Pass, at least partial completion of Regicide, and 56 Agility. Click here for better instructions on getting to him if you meet the requirements.
Speak to Jeed at the Duel Arena.
query: Someone watching the fights in the Duel Arena is your next destination.

desc: Speak to Hamad next to the Duel Arena's altar.
query: Identify the back of this over-acting brother. (He's a long way from home.)

desc: Dig directly under the sapphire spawn in the Spider's Nest in level 46 Wilderness, Northwest of Red Dragon Isle.
query: 46 is my number. My body is the colour of burnt orange and crawls among those with eight. Three mouths I have, yet I cannot eat. My blinking blue eye hides my grave.

desc: Dig by the cactus next to the Magic Carpet in Nardah.
query: As you desert this town, keep an eye out for a set of spines that could ruin nearby rugs: dig carefully around the greenry.

desc: Dig next to the tree between the gates on the outside wall of Port Phasmatys. Requires either completion of Priest in Peril or 64 Agility.
query: By the town of the dead, walk south down a rickety bridge, then dig near the slime-covered tree.

desc: Dig next to the southernmost Yew tree by the nettles in Edgeville.
query: Come to the evil ledge. Yew know yew want to, and try not to get stung.

desc: Dig in the middle of the crossroads in Mort'ton. Requires either completion of Priest in Peril or 64 Agility.
query: Covered in shadows, the centre of the circle is where you will find the answer.

desc: Dig directly under the bronze crossbow spawn at the Graveyard of Shadows in level 18 Wilderness.
query: I lie lonely and forgotten in the mid wilderness, where the dead rise from their beds. Feel free to quarrel and wind me up, and dig while you shoot their heads.

desc: Dig on the south side of the torch between the penguins and scorpions in the Ardougne Zoo.
query: The beasts to my east snap claws and tails. The rest to my west can slide and eat fish. The northern are silly and jump and wail. Dig by my fire and make a wish.

desc: Speak to Heckel Funch on the east side of the second floor of the Grand Tree.
Speak to an Examiner at the Exam Centre of the Digsite southeast of Varrock.
query: Often examined by learners of what has passed, find me where words of wisdom speak volumes.

desc: Speak to Wilough in the Varrock square.
query: My name is like a tree, yet it is spelt with a

desc: Speak to General Bentnoze at the Goblin Village north of Falador.
query: Generally speaking, his nose was very bent.

desc: Speak to Captain Bleemadge at the glider destination on White Wolf Mountain.
query: This aviator is at the peak of his profession

desc: Speak to the Gnome Trainer in the gnome agility course in the Tree Gnome Stronghold.
query: 'Small Shoe.' Often found with rod on mushroom.

desc: Speak to Gerrant at the fishing shop in Port Sarim.
query: If a man carried my burden, he would break his back. I am not rich, but leave silver in my track. Speak to the keeper of my trail.

desc: Speak to Oziach at his house in Edgeville.
query: A strange little man who sells armour only to those who've proven themselves to be unafraid of dragons.

desc: Speak to Abbot Langley in the Monastery west of Edgeville.
query: 'A bag belt only?' he asked his balding brothers.

desc: Search the crate on the second floor of Almera's house near the Baxtorian Falls.
query: A great view: watch the rapidly drying hides get splashed. Check the box you are sitting on.

desc: Search the crate on the the top floor of the windmill northwest of Lumbridge.
query: Four blades I have, yet draw no blood. Still I turn my prey to powder. If you are brave, come. Search my roof, it is there my blades are louder.

desc: Search the crate at the Ruins of Uzer east of the Shantay pass, in the Kharidian Desert.
query: His head might be hollow, but the crates nearby are filled with surprises.

desc: Search the haystack inside the Ranging Guild between Ardougne and Seers' Village. Requires 40 Ranged to enter.
query: If you look closely enough, it seems that the archers have lost more than their needles.

desc: Search the crate at the bottom part of the Tai Bwo Wannai Village.
query: In a village made of bamboo look for some crates under one of the houses.

desc: Search the mine cart at the end of the tracks north of the entrance in the Dwarven Mines under Falador.
query: It seems to have reached the end of the line, and it's still empty.

desc: Search the drawers on the second floor of Lumbridge Castle, in the room with the spinning wheel.
query: My home is grey, and made of stone. A castle with a search for a meal, hidden in some drawers I am, across from a wooden wheel.

desc: Search the bookshelf in the basement of the Wizard's Tower.
query: Probably filled with books on magic.

desc: Search the bookshelf on the second floor of the Sorcerer's Tower south of Seers' Village.
query: Read 'How To Breed Scorpions' by O.W. Thathurt.

desc: Search the crate in the store tent of the Bandit Camp southwest of the Shantay Pass, in the Kharidian Desert.
query: The cheapest water for miles around, but they react badly to religious icons.

desc: Search the crates on the second floor of the tower inside East Ardougne's church.
query: The crate on the first floor of a church is your next position.

desc: Search the crates on the third floor of the tower inside East Ardougne's church.
query: The crate in the tower of a church is your next position.

desc: Search the crate furthest from the shore near the fishing spot in southern Brimhaven.
query: The owner of this crate has a hunch that he put more than fish inside.

desc: Search the crate at the end of the tracks from the Coal Trucks, north of the Seer's Village bar.
query: This crate clearly marks the end of the line for coal.

desc: Search the crate behind the skillcape master's building in the Ranging Guild between Ardougne and Seer's Village. Requires 40 Ranged to enter.
query: This crate holds a better reward than a broken arrow.

desc: Search the crate by the big camel cart in the Desert Mining Camp south of the Shantay pass, in the Kharidian Desert. Requires partial completion of Tourist Trap to enter (the key to the gates can be obtained by killing the Mercenary Leader again). Unequip all your combat gear before entry, or you'll be jailed.
query: This crate is mine, all mine, even if it is in the middle of the desert.

desc: Search the bookshelf in the house nearest to the Gem Rocks in Shilo Village. Requires completion of the Shilo Village quest to enter.
query: This village has a problem with cartloads of the undead. Try checking the bookcase to find the answer.

desc: Search the drawers in Dazzle's house in East Ardougne, near the gates to West Ardougne.
query: Try not to let yourself be dazzled when you search these drawers.

desc: Search the drawers in the westernmost house on Entrana. You cannot travel to Entrana without first banking all items that give stats when equipped.
query: When no weapons are at hand, then is the time to reflect. In Saradomin's name, redemption draws closer…

desc: Search the drawers in the first upstairs room of the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.
query: Find a bar with a centre fountain in its city. Go upstairs and get changed.

desc: Search the drawers at Dunstan's house in the northeast part of Burthorpe. You need to kill Penda in the Toad And Chicken pub to the south to obtain a key to the drawers.
query: Go to the village being attacked by trolls, search the drawers while you are there.

desc: Search the drawers in the hallway upstairs at Jerico's house in East Ardougne. You need to kill any level 22 Guard located in the city to obtain a key to the drawers.
query: In a town where thieves steal from stalls, search for some drawers upstairs of a large house near the bank.

desc: Search the chest upstairs in the house north of the Magic Guild in Yanille. You need to kill any level 2 Man (one is conveniently located just downstairs) to obtain a key to the chest.
query: In a town where wizards are known to gather, search upstairs in a large house to the north.

desc: Search the drawers upstairs in the pub north of the Castle in East Ardougne. You need to kill any level 44 Guard Dog (easiest is in the mansion by the marketplace back across the bridge) to obtain a key to the drawers.
query: In a town where the guards are armed with maces, search the upstairs room of the Public House.

desc: Search the drawers in the basement of the Wizard's Tower. You need to kill any level 14 Wizard (easiest are right back upstairs) to obtain a key to the drawers.
Search the chest under the red dragon head in the Exam Centre building of the Digsite, southeast of Varrock. You need to kill any male Barbarian in the Barbarian Village to obtain a key to the chest.
query: This dead, red dragon watches over this chest. He must really dig the view.

desc: Search the drawers at the Monastery west of Edgeville. You need to kill any Monk of Zamorak (easiest is further west next to the Goblin Village) to obtain a key to the drawers.
query: The socks in these drawers are holier than thine, according to the tonsured owners.

desc: Search the chest at the chapel in northeastern Varrock. You need to kill any Monk in the Clocktower Monastery south of Ardougne to obtain a key to the chest.
query: You'll need to look for a town with a central fountain. Look for a locked chest in the town's chapel.

desc: West of McGrubor's Wood / east of the Coal Rocks/Coal Trucks area, dig in the correct spot outside the building.
In the Mine southeast of Varrock, dig in the correct spot.
East of the Ranging Guild / south of Seers' Village, dig in the correct spot.
Inside of West Ardougne (with Plague City completed), dig in the correct spot.
In Rimmington on the west side of the Chemist's house, dig in the correct spot.
In the Lumberyard northeast of Varrock, search the correct crate.
In Yanille south of the bank, between the room with the anvils and the city wall, dig in the correct spot.
At the Clocktower southwest of Ardougne, search the correct crate.
On Miscellania near the castle, dig in the correct spot.  Talk to the Sailor at the docks in Rellekka to get there; requires The Fremennik Trials' completion first.
At the Wizard's Tower, on the south side of the building, dig in the correct spot.
North of Falador in the circle of stones, dig in the correct spot.
Draynor Village by the southern willow tree, dig in the correct spot.
In level 50 Wilderness between the Wilderness Agility Course and Mage Arena/Mage Bank, dig in the correct spot.
Southeast of Ardougne near the Tower of Life, dig in the correct spot.
North of Castle Wars near the Observatory, search the correct crate.
Further North of Castle Wars north of the above Observatory clue, dig in the correct spot by the Altar.
North of Seers' Village on the path to Rellekka, dig in the correct spot.
Outside near the Legend's Guild entrance east of Ardougne, dig in the correct spot.
In the Southernmost point of the Mort Myre Swamp, dig in the correct spot. Requires either completion of Priest in Peril or 64 agility.
